TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemanticResultValue extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个语义值和选择性地将该值与语音识别语法的组件关联。

span.span: Represents a semantic value and optionally associates the value with a component of a speech recognition grammar.

related.span: 使用 SemanticResultKey 提取 SemanticResultValue

span.span: Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SemanticResultValue`构造函数支持指定 基础数据类型为、、或的 `bool` 实例 `int` `float` `string` 。The `SemanticResultValue` constructors support specifying an instance with an underlying data type of `bool`, `int`, `float`, or `string`. 构造函数可以 `SemanticResultValue` 在以下两种情况中创建实例：A constructor can create a `SemanticResultValue` instance in either of two circumstances: - `SemanticResultValue`当使用构造时，实例必须与语法元素显式关联 。The `SemanticResultValue` instance must be explicitly associated with a grammar element when using a to construct a . - 已 `SemanticResultValue` 与一个字符串值短语或对象相关联 。The `SemanticResultValue` is already associated with a string value phrase or a object.
